text.__SUMMARY__:
Arabis kennedyae, the Troodos rockcress, is a species of flowering plant in the family Brassicaceae.
It is endemic to Cyprus.
Its natural habitat is Mediterranean-type shrubby vegetation.
It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Kadis, C. & Christodoulou, C.S. 2006. Arabis kennedyae. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 July 2007.
